meta.description: Determine the minimum cost of producing a plant growth compound by mixing fertilizers C and Y to meet nitrous oxide and vitamin mix requirements.

sets.name: FERTILIZERS
sets.description: Types of fertilizers used in the compound

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per kg of each fertilizer

params.name: nitrous_oxide_content
params.description: Units of nitrous oxide per kg of each fertilizer

params.name: vitamin_mix_content
params.description: Units of vitamin mix per kg of each fertilizer

vars.name: x
vars.description: Amount of each fertilizer to use in kg

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of fertilizers used

constraints.name: nitrous_oxide_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 5 units of nitrous oxide in the compound

constraints.name: vitamin_mix_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 8 units of vitamin mix in the compound
